content:
# Financial support for the participation of doctoral students in "summer schools" abroad – 1st edition -- AGH University Doctoral School 

URL: https://www.sd.agh.edu.pl/en/news/detail?tx_news_pi1%5Baction%5D=detail&tx_news_pi1%5Bcontroller%5D=News&tx_news_pi1%5Bnews%5D=1177&cHash=8ceed5281825c4f3100dbe527792b3b5
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:21:58

Financial support for the participation of doctoral students in "summer schools" abroad – 1st edition 

 05-03-2025 

 The aim of the program is to enable doctoral students to travel for active participation in international "summer schools" organized abroad. 

On March 5, 2025, the call for applications for the first financial program for participation in foreign "summer schools" for doctoral students was launched.

Deadline for submission: August 31, 2025

APPLICATION ON-LINE

PROGRAM DETAILS

Back
